section.p: This abstract class specifies the permission that is assigned by the consenter to specific users of client health record information. The permission may control collection, access, use, or disclosure of a specific type of protected information (including IIHI). Note that this class was named 'OperationType' in the original DAM.

ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] operationCategory with data type Code
This attribute identifies the operation that is either allowed or prohibited by the permission. Note that this property was named 'OperationCode' in the original DAM.

Contains zero or one [0..1] operationCategory with data type Code
This attribute identifies the operation that is either allowed or prohibited by the permission. Note that this property was named 'OperationCode' in the original DAM.
